traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The ki-rin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The ki-rin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: gaseous form, major image (6th-level version), wind walk * 1/day: create food and water

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The ki-rin's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The ki-rin is a 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, lesser restoration, silence * 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, remove curse, sending * 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith * 5th level (3 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, scrying * 6th level (1 slot): heroes' feast, true seeing * 7th level (1 slot): etherealness, plane shift * 8th level (1 slot): control weather * 9th level (1 slot): true resurrection

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ki-rin makes three attacks: two with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hoof
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.desc: The ki-rin makes a Wisdom (Perception) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check.

legendary.name: Smite
legendary.desc: The ki-rin makes a hoof attack or casts sacred flame.

legendary.name: Move
legendary.desc: The ki-rin moves up to its half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
